Package net.sf.jstuff.xml.stream

Class StAXFactory

java.lang.Object
net.sf.jstuff.xml.stream.StAXFactory
public class StAXFactory extends Object
Thread-safe XMLInputFactory/XMLOutputFactory factory.
Author:
Sebastian Thomschke
